ygData.subject: Re: Pottery is dead
ygData.msgSnippet: IMO pottery and most other trade skills are have simply become an amusment for high lvl characters to sink their extra plat into. ... sell
ygData.messageBody:
IMO pottery and most other "trade skills" are have simply become an amusment
for high lvl characters to sink their extra plat into.

>They have all the vials and always have the vials
>every time I check. They are cheap and easy to find. The case with the
>rogues simply doesn't exist on my server. The results of my attempt to
sell
>vials ranged from grim amusement to outright antagonsim. This could change
>but I highly doubt it once the word gets out about the vendors (at least in
>Freeport marketplace
>

>
>Aye, sadly I have to agree with you. I busted my hump to be one of the
>first to figure out the 'ever elusive' vial recipes. Found it, made them
>and guess what....there they sit in my bank collecting dust. Many rogues
>don't even know the recipes for poison on my server therefore rendering the
>vials pointless.
>
>There is not a damn thing I can sell to ANY player which
>they can't either buy cheaper from a damn merchant somewhere or which they
>can't take a bit of money and an hour or two and work on their own pottery
>and become self sufficient. So much for this trade skill!!!
>
>True Pottery is dead, they dont even have to make poison, they can just
>go to W.Karana and have
>the NPC rogue make it for them, (Spider poison) or the Dwarf NPC in Dagnors
>Cauldron (Snake Poison) Verants way of "Enhancing" trade skills.
